DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect data help researcher identify factor prevent certain individual receive beneficial effect exercise .
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY OBJECTIVES/ENDPOINTS 1 . The primary endpoint study maximal capacity mitochondrial ATP synthesis measure use 31P magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( MRS ) . 2 . The principal secondary endpoint relationship exercise-induced change mitochondrial function vivo exercise mimetic-induced change mitochondrial function vitro . 3 . The principal tertiary endpoint relationship basal promoter methylation status key gene involve fuel metabolism know activated exercise skeletal muscle tissue cell exercise-induced response mitochondrial function . As exercise array metabolic effect , well position cutting-edge methodology Translational Research Institute ( TRI ) , also measure whole body insulin sensitivity metabolic flexibility hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp , substrate oxidation energy expenditure whole room calorimeter/metabolic chamber intramyocellular lipid content .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Inclusion Criteria ( Group 1 ) Age 30 65 year . Male Hispanic NonHispanic Caucasian Type 2 diabetes determine selfreport fast glucose > 126mg/dl POCT HbA1c result 5.78.8 HbA1c 6.0 % 8.5 % , participant miss screen HbA1c small margin ( HbA1c ± 0.1 % ) , HbA1c repeat . Not involved regular exercise program Willing exercise every day study period If applicable , currently take antidiabetic medication take metformin , sulfonylurea , DPP IV inhibitor , alphaglucosidase inhibitor , meglitinide , colesevelam , cycloset SGLT2 inhibitor . Those take 2 medication may proceed . If applicable , willing cease antidiabetic medication use duration intervention . BMI ≥ 22 kg/m2 Young Athletes Inclusion Criteria ( Group 2 ) Age 18 50 year Male Hispanic NonHispanic Caucasian Engaged minimum 4 cumulative hour moderate vigorous intensity aerobic exercise , minimum 3 day per week . BMI 18 29.9 kg/m2 VO2max great less 45 ml/min/kg BW General Exclusion Criteria A=all group , Ex=exercise group Resting blood pressure ≥ 160/100 mm Hg ( A ) Triglycerides great less 500 mg/dL ( A ) Previous current use insulin pump multiple insulin injection per day diabetes medication participant refrain duration study . ( A ) Treatment thiazolidinediones ( TZDs ) GLP1 agonists within last 3 month . ( A ) Unable unwilling communicate staff provide write informed consent . ( A ) Failure complete baseline testing . ( A ) Not physically capable perform exercise require study protocol . ( Ex ) Consuming > 14 alcoholic beverage per week . ( A ) Plans away > 2 week next 3 month . ( A ) Lack support primary health care provider and/or family member . ( Ex ) Significant weight loss past year ( > 20 lb ) current use weight loss medication . ( A ) Bariatric surgery planning bariatric surgery next 6 month . ( Ex ) Presence clinically significant abnormality ECG ( A ) Anyrenal , cardiac , liver , lung , neurological disease opinion Investigator would compromise participant safety ( A ) Use drug know affect energy metabolism body weight : include , limited : orlistat , sibutramine , ephedrine , phenylpropanolamine , corticosterone , etc ( A ) Current treatment blood thinner antiplatelet medication safely stop test procedure . ( A ) New onset ( < 3 month stable regime ) hormone replacement therapy . ( A ) Alcohol drug abuse ( A ) Current smoker ( smoke within past 3 month ) ( A ) Gait problem ( Ex ) Unwilling unable abstain caffeine , alcohol strenuous exercise ( 48h ) prior metabolic rate measurement ( A ) Increased liver function test ( AST/ALT/GGT/or alkaline phosphatase great 2.5 time upper limit normal ) ( A ) Metal object would interfere measurement body composition /MRS implant rod , surgical clip , etc ( A ) Any NYHA class CHF ( A ) Abnormal blood count/Anemia , blood transfusion blood donation within last 2 month . ( A ) Major surgery abdomen , pelvis , low extremity within previous 3 month ( A ) Bariatric surgery liposuction within previous 3 year ( Ex ) Cancer ( active malignancy without concurrent chemotherapy ) ( A ) Rheumatoid disease ( A ) Bypass graft limb ( A ) Known genetic factor ( Factor V Leiden , etc ) hypercoagulable state ( A ) Peripheral neuropathy , involve toe ( A ) Claustrophobia ( A ) Major Depression ( Ex ) Presence eat disorder eat attitudes/behaviors could interfere study completion ( Ex ) Presence condition , opinion investigator , compromise participant safety data integrity participant ' ability complete training protocol .
